transcript:
Customer: Sir wo mujhe ho jata hai problem ho jati hai.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Haan, main keh raha hun dekhiye aapko do step follow karna hai main nahi keh raha sari consume karo jo aapke kaam ke nahi hai. Aapke jo kaam ke aap usse hi consume kariyega. Jo aapke kaam ki nahi hai usko aap delete kar dijiyega ki delete I don't deal in this product is product fiber mein deal nahi karta ya fir jo bhi hai usme delete kar dijiyega. Taki wo lead hamare paas feedback aaye aur wo aapko aana band ho jaye sir wo lead jaisi wo us tarike ki lead hai.
Bas ye do process follow kar lijiyega aapke jo kaam ke consume kariye aur jo nahi hai to delete kar dijiye. Main aapko bata do delete kaise karte hain sir ek baar?
Customer: Side mein option rehta hai delete ka usse karna hai na?
Executive: Delete nahi sirf delete karne ke to option khulte honge cheh saat option aate honge aapke paas. Aap usme se kaunsa select karte ho?
Customer: Kis cheez ka option aata hai matlab?
Executive: Matlab jaise ek baar aap delete pe kar lijiye main aapko samjha deta hun wo pe option khulte hain aap kisi pe bhi mat select kariye. Usme option aata hai ki main is product mein deal nahi karta ya retail hai wo sari cheez to aap
Customer: Alag product ke related
Executive: Haan main dikh raha hai mere ko ki hamara kya kehte hain isme category mein nahi hai.
Customer: Haan bahut sare option hai to aap na correct choose kariye. Aap ye ek hafta 10 din feedback denge to aap dekhenge aapki profile mein change hoga jo aapke kaam ka nahi hai wo hat jayega aur jo aapke kaam ka related consume karega wo aapka badhta chala jayega aapke paas. To waha se aapka business nikalna chalu ho jayega. Kyunki dekho main bhi maan raha hun sir teen consume karenge to teen mein utna ratio nahi milega aapko. Haan aap 10-15 karenge to waha se aapko teen se char aapke kaam ka mil jayega.
Customer: Sir wo consume to jab kare jab stone ki inquiry ho wo.
Executive: Kuch bhi consume kar lenge yaar.
Executive: Haan main samajh gaya main main usko dekh ke hi keh raha hun sir main aapki baat samajh ke hi keh raha hun aur kya na. But aap dekhenge agar aap ye process follow karenge chahe starting ka ek do rahega lekin dheere dheere karke wo badhta chala jayega aapki profile ke andar.
Customer: Chaliye theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai? Aap kariye to ek hafta main khud call karunga feedback lene ke liye aap se.
Customer: Okay.
Customer: Are ab kuch aaye tab to main consume karu usko.
Executive: Main jab aayega tab kya hoga.
Customer: Kuch option.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer facing issues with irrelevant buyleads.



Resolution:

- Executive advised to delete irrelevant buyleads.

- Executive explained the deletion process with options.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call after a week for feedback.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, deletion, process
